translation: Under Me, as supervisor, Nature produces the moving and the unmoving; therefore, O Arjuna, the world revolves.
commentary: 9.10 Maya by Me? by the president as supervisor? Nature: Nature? Suyate produces? The moving and the unmoving? Hetuna by cause? Anen by this? Kaunteya Or Kaunteya? Jagat the world? reverses revolves.Commentary The Lord presides only as a witness. Nature does everything. By reason of His proximity or presence? Nature sends forth the moving and the unmoving. The prime cause of this creation is Nature.
